Text: "Magic Man" is a song by the American rock band Heart.

Triplets:<Heart
1:
--------------------

<Text: Magic Man:  The single was released in Canada in June of 1975, and in America in 1976, as the second single from the band's debut album, "Dreamboat Annie.">

Triplets:<Magic Man
2:
--------------------
Text: Magic Man:  Written and composed by Ann and Nancy Wilson, the song is sung from the viewpoint of a young girl who is being seduced by an older man (referred to as a Magic Man), much to the chagrin of her mother, who calls and begs the girl to come home.
